about_the_game:
The Death King roamed the vast expanse of the Wild West until he stumbled upon a lonely bar, standing like a mirage in the silent desert. Crossing the threshold, he ordered a pizza, and when the steaming masterpiece of culinary art was served on the table, the door creaked open, allowing a stranger to enter, daring to steal such a precious dish. Who is he, this one who dares to challenge Death itself?

Without a second thought, the Death King set off in pursuit of the thief. Along the way, he was ready to sow destruction: annihilating bandits, exterminating zombies, and wiping out any vile creatures from the face of the earth. No matter the obstacles, he will get his pizza back, at any cost!

Features:

Weapons: Shotgun, Rifle, Pair of revolvers;
Enemies: Zombies, Gun-wielding bandits, Slimes from dungeons;
Bosses: 3 bosses in total;
Locations: Many different locations;

The final boss is the mysterious stranger who stole the pizza
